name: Agent 10013946
description:
Gameplay Summary:

This game is a stealth game. In this game, the player must avoid detection from enemies. The mission in the game is to find hidden intel inside a large enemy fortress. If the player is sighted by the enemy, the mission is a failure. The game has auto-saving mechanics but players can also manually place checkpoints.

Control Overview:
Up arrow key or W=Move Up
Left arrow key or A=Move left
Right arrow key or D=Move Right
Down arrow key or S=Move Down
P=Open up Pause Menu

Story:
A hostile planet called Ragantahb is threatening the planet called Gnaved. Agent 10013946 from Gnaved is sent on a mission from Commander Ytsur to infiltrate an important enemy fortress in Ragantahb. His mission is to find important and relevant intel in the strongly guarded fortress.

Credits:
